item.title: Producer and Consumer
item.description: I used to learn something by passively consuming it. Be it by watching a video course, reading a book/article, or looking into tutorials. Most of the time, the knowledge will be lost as soon as I move to learn another thing. So now, I’m trying a new thing. Whenever I want to learn something, I must produce something. So instead of passively consuming, I need to actively produce as well.
